thread.title: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom hospitalized in Nevada
thread.title_full: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom hospitalized in Nevada

title: Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom hospitalized in Nevada
text:
Ex-NBA star Lamar Odom hospitalized in Nevada 8:34am BST - 00:49 
Former NBA star Lamar Odom is hospitalised after being found unresponsive at a brothel in Nevada. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
ROUGH CUT (NO REPORTER NARRATION) Former NBA star Lamar Odom was hospitalized on Tuesday after he was found unresponsive at a Nevada brothel, law enforcement officials said. Odom, 35, the ex-husband of reality television personality Khloe Kardashian, suffered a "medical emergency" at the Love Ranch in Crystal, Nevada, about 80 miles (50 kms) northwest of Las Vegas, the Nye County Sheriff's Office said in media release. Odom, whose career in the NBA included seasons with the Los Angeles Lakers and Dallas Mavericks, stands 6' 10" (2.08 meters). The sheriff's office said an investigation was being conducted and gave no further details about Odom's condition of what caused the emergency.  //reut.rs/1MqdZ7o
